tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (PRP$ My) (JJ whole) (NN perception)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (NNS people)) (PP (IN in) (NP (JJ general)))))) (, ,) (VP (VBZ has) (VP (VBN changed) (NP-TMP (DT this) (NN year)))) (: ...)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [changed/VBN nsubj>[perception/NN nmod:poss>My/PRP$ amod>whole/JJ nmod:of>[people/NNS case>of/IN nmod:in>[general/JJ case>in/IN]]] punct>,/, aux>has/VBZ nmod:tmod>[year/NN det>this/DT] punct>.../:]
